stages.label: Inspiration
stages.description: Passive discovery — social media, content, word-of-mouth, ads. The traveler doesn't have a specific trip in mind yet.

stages.label: Research
stages.description: Active information gathering — reading reviews, comparing destinations, checking conditions, budgeting.

stages.label: Planning
stages.description: Structuring the trip — building itineraries, selecting dates, coordinating with travel companions.

stages.label: Booking
stages.description: Committing and transacting — reserving flights, hotels, activities, car rentals.

stages.label: Pre-Trip
stages.description: Between booking and departure — document prep, packing, last-mile logistics, confirmation management.

stages.label: Transit
stages.description: Getting there and between — airport, flight, ground transport, transfers, border crossings.

stages.label: In-Destination
stages.description: On the ground — local discovery, navigation, dining, activities, events, nearby now.

stages.label: Post-Trip
stages.description: After return — reviews, expense reconciliation, photo organization, loyalty management.

stages.label: Reflection & Re-Inspiration
stages.description: Longer-term — sharing stories, revisiting memories, planning the next trip. The loop back to J0.
